shortDescription: An issue was discovered in SuperWebMailer 9.00.0.01710. It allows superadmincreate.php XSS via crafted incorrect passwords.
vulnerabilityName: superwebmailer superwebmailer Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
